#text=I thought about taking my usual shower today , but decided to take a bath instead .
#text=I have had a stressful week and the relaxation will do me good .
#text=I get everything ready that I will need-my towel , my bath beads , a book and a candle .
#text=I run the water just a bit on the warm side since I do n't want the bath getting cold too soon .
#text=I put the stopper in on the bath drain and then pour in my bath beads .
#text=I 've lit my candle and grabbed my book .
#text=I love to soak for a bit , it 's so relaxing .
#text=I will get through a chapter or two of my book , depending how fast I feel like reading .
#text=After my bath , I will towel off and get into my pajamas .
#text=I always seem to sleep better after taking a relaxing bath .
